queries.querystring: Select n.hazard, (select concat(lc1.DESCRIPTION) from mrqr_lookup_codes lc1 where lc1.type='HAZ' and lc1.code=n.hazard) HAZD, (select concat(lc1.DESCRIPTION_FR) from mrqr_lookup_codes lc1 where lc1.type='HAZ' and lc1.code=n.hazard) HAZDF, (select concat(lc1.DESCRIPTION_NL) from mrqr_lookup_codes lc1 where lc1.type='HAZ' and lc1.code=n.hazard) HAZDN, n.un_code, (select lc2.DESCRIPTION from mrqr_lookup_codes lc2 where lc2.type='UNC' and lc2.code=n.un_code) UNCD, (select lc2.DESCRIPTION_FR from mrqr_lookup_codes lc2 where lc2.type='UNC' and lc2.code=n.un_code) UNCDF, (select lc2.DESCRIPTION_NL from mrqr_lookup_codes lc2 where lc2.type='UNC' and lc2.code=n.un_code) UNCDN, n.shipping_name, n.net_expl_weight from MRQR_NSN n join MRQR_ASSETS a on a.nsn=n.nsn where a.asset='pASSET' and (n.hazard is not null or n.un_code is not null) limit 50
select a.* from MRQR_ASSETS a where a.ASSET='pASSET' limit 50

select f.FUNCTION, f.DESCRIPTION, f.PARENT, f.WSC, (select lc.description from MRQR_LOOKUP_CODES lc where lc.code=f.wsc and lc.type='WSC') WSC_DESC, f.MAN_ORG, f.FICTIVE, f.ESSENTIAL, f.SUPERVISED, concat(f.REPORT_MAINTENANCE,f.REPORT_LOGISTIC,f.REPORT_STATUS) REP_MLS, f.FUEL_NSN, f.CO2_TAX_APPLICABLE from MRQR_ASSETS a join MRQR_functions f on a.function=f.function where a.ASSET='pASSET' limit 50
select aos.STATUS, aos.STATUSDATE, aos.ORGANISM, aos.WO from MRQR_ASSETS_OPERATIONAL_STATUS aos where aos.ASSET='pASSET' LIMIT 10
